name: Ultimate Space Escape Demo!
description:
My first venture into the game dev scene! A simplistic, yet (hopefully) fun little brick breaking game made by yours truly. This is, as the title suggests, the demo of a chunkier experience soon to come! 

Just a quick heads up: This demo, in its current state, does not save upgrades nor coin count after closing the game. This feature will be added later on!

Please, comment down below any feedback you have on the game, whether it be glitches, ideas, or just your overall thoughts on the experience :)

Subscribe to my YouTube channel!

Go follow Neonveins_ on Soundcloud and Twitch!

 They created 2 tracks for this demo.

Go follow InixtheWolfmage on Soundcloud! 

They created the Level Theme for this demo.
